Action: Answer("D")

The correct answer is D: Ergotamine.
Ergotamine is not commonly used to treat postpartum hemorrhage (PPH). Mifepristone, Misoprostol, and Oxytocin are all commonly used medications to treat PPH. Ergotamine is a medication used to treat migraines and other vascular headaches. It is not related to PPH management.
